ValidationRule.description: User is required to enter a comment on why the opportunity was lost if the lost reason is "Lacks Key Feature" or "Performance/Failed POC". User Story SFDC-1184.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(ReasonLost__c, 'Lacks Key Feature / Did not Meeting Reqs.'), ISPICKVAL(ReasonLost__c, 'Performance / Failed POC') ), ISBLANK(ReasonLostNotes__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Lost Reason Note if the lost reason is either 'Lacks Key Feature' or 'Performance/Failed POC'.
